languages.text: "Множественные замены в цепи управляющих распределителей. Изменения алгоритма работы шифратора в кортикальном аугменте". {n}Теперь Паскаль говорит совсем холодно и спокойно, будто перечисляет хранимые на складе запчасти.{/n} "Дестабилизирована работа химического инъект-анализатора".

"Detecting numerous replacements in chain of command distributors. Alterations have been made to the operational algorithm of the encoder inside my cortical augmetic." {n}Pasqal now speaks with complete indifference and calm, as if reading out an inventory of spare parts at a warehouse.{/n} "The chemical inject-analyser has been destabilised."
languages.original_text: "Множественные замены в цепи управляющих распределителей. Изменения алгоритма работы шифратора в кортикальном аугменте". {n}Теперь Паскаль говорит совсем холодно и спокойно, будто перечисляет хранимые на складе запчасти.{/n} "Дестабилизирована работа химического инъект-анализатора".

traits.locale_text: "Detecting numerous replacements in the chain of command distributors. Alterations have been made to the operational algorithm of the encoder inside my cortical augment." {n}Pasqal now speaks with complete indifference and calm, as if reading out an inventory of spare parts at a warehouse.{/n} "The chemical inject-analyser has been destabilised."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「指揮系統に多数の入れ替わりを検知しました。皮質オーグメティック内のエンコーダーの動作アルゴリズムに変更が加えられています」{n}パスカルは、まるで倉庫でスペアパーツの在庫を読み上げるかのように、完全に無関心かつ冷静に話している。{/n}「化学注入分析装置が不安定化しました」
languages.original_text: "Detecting numerous replacements in chain of command distributors. Alterations have been made to the operational algorithm of the encoder inside my cortical augmetic." {n}Pasqal now speaks with complete indifference and calm, as if reading out an inventory of spare parts at a warehouse.{/n} "The chemical inject-analyser has been destabilised."

traits.locale_text: 「指揮系統に多数の入れ替わりを検知しました。皮質オーグメティック内のエンコーダーの動作アルゴリズムに変更が加えられています」{n}パスカルは、まるで倉庫でスペアパーツの在庫を読み上げるかのように、完全に無関心かつ冷静に話している。{/n}「化学注入分析装置が不安定化しました」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “指挥分配链中发现了大量的替换内容，我的皮质植入物内编码器的操作算法发生了变化。”{n}帕斯卡的语气极其冷漠、平静，没有一丝涟漪，仿佛在阅读仓库的备件清单一样。{/n}“化学注射分析仪的稳定性遭到了破坏。”
languages.original_text: "Detecting numerous replacements in chain of command distributors. Alterations have been made to the operational algorithm of the encoder inside my cortical augmetic." {n}Pasqal now speaks with complete indifference and calm, as if reading out an inventory of spare parts at a warehouse.{/n} "The chemical inject-analyser has been destabilised."

traits.locale_text: “指挥分配链中发现了大量的替换内容，我的皮质植入物内编码器的操作算法发生了变化。”{n}帕斯卡的语气极其冷漠、平静，没有一丝涟漪，仿佛在阅读仓库的备件清单一样。{/n}“化学注射分析仪的稳定性遭到了破坏。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Detectando numerosos reemplazos en los distribuidores de la cadena de mando. Se han realizado alteraciones en el algoritmo operativo del codificador dentro de mi aumético cortical». {n}Pasqal habla ahora con total indiferencia y calma, como si leyera un inventario de repuestos en un almacén.{/n} «El inyector-analizador químico ha sido desestabilizado».
languages.original_text: "Detecting numerous replacements in chain of command distributors. Alterations have been made to the operational algorithm of the encoder inside my cortical augmetic." {n}Pasqal now speaks with complete indifference and calm, as if reading out an inventory of spare parts at a warehouse.{/n} "The chemical inject-analyser has been destabilised."

traits.locale_text: «Detectando numerosos reemplazos en los distribuidores de la cadena de mando. Se han realizado alteraciones en el algoritmo operativo del codificador dentro de mi aumético cortical». {n}Pasqal habla ahora con total indiferencia y calma, como si leyera un inventario de repuestos en un almacén.{/n} «El inyector-analizador químico ha sido desestabilizado».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich registriere mehrere Veränderungen in den Distributoren der Befehlskette. Der operative Algorithmus des Encoders in meiner kortikalen Augmentation wurde abgeändert." {n}Pasqal spricht nun mit völliger Gleichgültigkeit und Ruhe, als würde er aus einem Inventar von Ersatzteilen in einem Lagerhaus vorlesen.{/n} "Der chemische Injektionsanalysator wurde destabilisiert."
languages.original_text: "Detecting numerous replacements in chain of command distributors. Alterations have been made to the operational algorithm of the encoder inside my cortical augmetic." {n}Pasqal now speaks with complete indifference and calm, as if reading out an inventory of spare parts at a warehouse.{/n} "The chemical inject-analyser has been destabilised."

traits.locale_text: "Ich registriere mehrere Veränderungen in den Distributoren der Befehlskette. Der operative Algorithmus des Encoders in meiner kortikalen Augmentation wurde abgeändert." {n}Pasqal spricht nun mit völliger Gleichgültigkeit und Ruhe, als würde er aus einem Inventar von Ersatzteilen in einem Lagerhaus vorlesen.{/n} "Der chemische Injektionsanalysator wurde destabilisiert."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Multiples remplacements détectés dans la distribution hiérarchique. L'algorithme opérationnel de l'encodeur de mon augmétique cortical a été altéré. » {n}Pasqal parle avec calme et indifférence, comme s'il égrenait un inventaire de pièces détachées.{/n} « L'analyseur-injecteur chimique a été déstabilisé. »
languages.original_text: "Detecting numerous replacements in chain of command distributors. Alterations have been made to the operational algorithm of the encoder inside my cortical augmetic." {n}Pasqal now speaks with complete indifference and calm, as if reading out an inventory of spare parts at a warehouse.{/n} "The chemical inject-analyser has been destabilised."

traits.locale_text: « Multiples remplacements détectés dans la distribution hiérarchique. L'algorithme opérationnel de l'encodeur de mon augmétique cortical a été altéré. » {n}Pasqal parle avec calme et indifférence, comme s'il égrenait un inventaire de pièces détachées.{/n} « L'analyseur-injecteur chimique a été déstabilisé. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Emir komuta zinciri distribütörlerinin pek çoğunun başka parçalarla değiştirildiği tespit edildi. Zihinsel ogmetiğimin içindeki kodlayıcının işlemsel algoritmasında değişiklikler yapıldı." {n}Pasqal, artık bir depodaki yedek parça envanterini okurmuşçasına kayıtsızca ve sakince konuşuyor.{/n} "Kimyasal enjektör analizörü destabilize edilmiş."
languages.original_text: "Detecting numerous replacements in chain of command distributors. Alterations have been made to the operational algorithm of the encoder inside my cortical augmetic." {n}Pasqal now speaks with complete indifference and calm, as if reading out an inventory of spare parts at a warehouse.{/n} "The chemical inject-analyser has been destabilised."

traits.locale_text: "Emir komuta zinciri distribütörlerinin pek çoğunun başka parçalarla değiştirildiği tespit edildi. Kortikal ogmetiğimin içindeki kodlayıcının işlemsel algoritmasında değişiklikler yapılmış." {n}Pasqal, artık bir depodaki yedek parça envanterini okurmuşçasına tamamen kayıtsız ve sakin bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Kimyasal enjektör analizörü destabilize edilmiş."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
